name: Cosmic Chaos (Scorpion Games) (Scorpion Games)
description:
This game is an improved version of my Alakajam #10 entry which can be found at https://scorpion-games-uk.itch.io/cosmic-chaos-akj.

Controls:

The  ships follow the cursor, and left click fires bullets. Press 'E' to use a powerup.

Background:

You ship's core is unstable, and repeatedly duplicates itself, dividing its health between itself and the clones. If your original ship (with yellow markings) dies, it's game over! Use the clones to shield your command ship, and collect powerups to improve your ability to defeat the alien hordes.
